metadata.name: Computer Password Change Via Ksetup.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects password change for the computer's domain account or host principal via "ksetup.exe"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\ksetup.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('ksetup.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /setcomputerpassword ')))

output.summary: Detects password change for the computer's domain account or host principal via "ksetup.exe"
